Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Description:
伊娃．萊萬特回歸為《亡靈節：幽魂森林》的使者。這個節慶是守護者放縱自己吃甜食、戴上不敬的面具來慶祝那些亡者回憶的時刻。

幽魂森林的入口再度開啟，而這一次，蜘蛛王想跟你談條件，請你與他合作。去找他，把解碼器弄到手，然後在幽魂森林陰暗的長廊中與時間賽跑。保持警覺，靈機應變，最後可能有機會獲得多個寶物箱。
Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Name: 亡靈節
Event.IronBanner.Description: A special week-long Crucible event that challenges teams of 6 to go head-to-head in the most competitive form of Control. Light level advantages enabled.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description: 緬懷各地守護者奉獻犧牲的年度傳統再次到來。伊娃回到高塔，正在英豪之像旁等你。聚集在一起來慶祝人類偉大守護者堅強的韌性
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description.Exten: 於歐洲空域(EAZ)翱翔、迎戰邪魔族、卡巴爾與墮落者。在此三人組隊戰鬥的活動中消滅你的敵人、在歐洲空域捕獲所有寶箱。擊敗越多的頭目，就能獲得越多獎勵
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Name: 英豪二至點2020
Event.TheDawning.Description: 在這個特別的年代，即使是木衛二的雪窖冰天也凍不了守護者溫暖的心。伊娃．萊萬特邀請你回到高塔來學習新食譜、尋找一兩份令人驚喜的禮物，並用你美輪美奐的異域飛船來一場旅行。散播歡樂、入手裝備。黎明日已然回歸。
Event.TheDawning.Name: 黎明日
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Description:
Destiny 中有多個統計的數據來源，工會歷史數據統計基於HistoricalStats API 而其他統計數據來源於PGCRs 很難確定哪個數據更准確。

要從Bungie.net服務器下載兆級別的數據并具有强大的計算能力，這也就意味著他們足夠準確。可以進行友好的對比
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Name: 公會歷史統計並不壹定與其他統計保持壹致
展示可收集物和記錄的詳細數據
FAQ.Braytech.ProfilePrivacy.Description:
🦘 If you're concerned for your privacy while playing Destiny and how the API exposes your progression and activities for use by third parties, you may alter your privacy settings on [Bungie.net](https://bungie.net/en/Profile/Settings/?category=Privacy).

Doing so will require that you authenticate Braytech with Bungie for continued use.
FAQ.Braytech.ProfilePrivacy.Name: 🦘 Profile privacy
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Descrip:
從 _Settings_ 視圖, 您可以嘗試各種操作 開始 _Update service worker_. 稍等片刻，系統會提示您重新載入.

如果失敗，您可以嘗試選擇 _Reload_ 刷新應用程式. 如果問題仍然存在請選擇 _Dump service worker_.

_For the technically inclined, Braytech uses a service worker and sometimes they're fussy._
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Name: Braytech不會更新到最新版本
FAQ.Voluspa.About.Description: 🦘 _Voluspa_, named after a sub-mind of _Rasputin_, is what I've named the serverside component of Braytech. It's respomsible for scrpaing the profiles of Braytech's users for commonality statistics, settings sync, and other key features.
FAQ.Voluspa.About.Name: 🦘 About Voluspa
Item.CurrentlyCantRoll: 🦘 This perk currently does not roll on this weapon
Landing.Blog.Error: 目前無法載入博客文章
Landing.Features.Description:
🦘 Braytech is a web app that started out small. Its development has been ongoing for over two years and has seen many incremental additions and improvements. Its developer, Tom Chapman, is a fan of Destiny's design as heralded by [MacKay Clark](https://www.artstation.com/mackayclark), [Ryan Klaverweide](https://www.artstation.com/alrightok), [Joseph Cross](https://www.artstation.com/josephacross), and others, and it's heavenly influenced the design and intended aesthetic of Braytech.

Starting out small, Braytech has grown to encompass many functions. Notably, replicating the experiences of the game's _Triumphs_ and _Collections_ views.

Today, Braytech does a lot more than just triumph records and checklists. Building all these interfaces was the first step—subsequent steps include connecting them to one another and realising the relationships between their data e.g. how quests connect to specific locations in the game world.

Need to find something quick? Press  and start typing! Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but works and looks beautiful as a mobile app. In fact, there's an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa) in the Play store.
Landing.Features.Name: 萬事通.
Landing.Onboarding.Hotline.Description: Braytech 是Destiny 的第三方伴侶應用，它使玩家可以監視自己的進度并添加精選内容和交互式地圖更好的游玩
Landing.Onboarding.Hotline.Name: Braytech
Landing.Support.Description:
Building these beautiful interfaces and fencing with Bungie's APIs takes effort and time. I can only devote so much of it to hobby ventures, which also cost money to keep online. I have a firm stance against ads on web sites as we know them. As such, I prefer to support these projects out of my own pocket and depend on the generosity of my community.

By supporting me, you can help ensure that I can keep these projects online, as well as help enable me to continue adding cool new features.
Landing.Support.Name: 支援Braytech

Maps.ProposeChanges.Form.Screenshots.Des:
Proposed screenshots must meet a strict quality criteria:
- display resolution of 1920x1080
- no visible HUD
- no visible Guardians or equipment
- no visible enemies
- maximum video settings
  - including a render resolution of 200%

Search.ShortcutKey: ### 按  鍵可從任意位置呼出搜索功能
Search.Suggestions:
Search supports filters as prefixes. Try `name:mida` to only match entities whereby their name value includes the term "mida."

Supported prefixes:
- name
- description
- source

You may also search by manifest `hash`.

Results will be prioritised by name, source, and description.

Upsell.Auth.Description: 想查詢您的目標和其他數據進度嗎？通過Bungie.net進行身份驗證，並允許Braytech安全獲取您的個人游戲數據資料.
Upsell.Profile.Description: Want to see your objective progress, redeemed records, discovered collectibles, and way more? Load your profile and select your character.
UserModule.DreamingCityCurse.Flair1:
🦘 Savathûn's Curse begins to take hold on the Awoken's sacred city.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
UserModule.DreamingCityCurse.Flair2:
🦘 Savathûn's Curse tightens its grip on _The Dreaming City_.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
UserModule.DreamingCityCurse.Flair3:
🦘 Savathûn's Curse is at its full strength and its corruption touches every corner of the city.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Headline: 嘿 {{displayName}}, 妳知道嗎？可以通過 Bungie.net 認證 Braytech 來使用更多功能.
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Text: Braytech的大部分功能對所有用戶可用, 並且依賴於公開數據, 而 Destiny 的壹些功能需要訪問權限, 您可以通過登錄 Bungie.net 進行身份驗證來授權 Braytech
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell1.Descripti: Quests and bounties, step by step, reward by reward
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell2.Descripti: Minimal though powerful clan management for rapid sorting and member actions
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell2.Name: 🦘 Clan Administration
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell3.Descripti: Get helpful reminders regarding your soon to be overflowing postmaster
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell4.Descripti: Secret new features are always in the pipeline...

Your most feared, devastating, tormenting nightmares reincarnate―be immovable in your resolve, Guardian.

_Hunt down this week's available nightmares for... satisfaction._
UserModules.Patreon.Description:
🦘 We all hate ads. They're ugly. They're annoying. They collect your data and sell it to third parties.

Help keep them away from Braytech by supporting the app through Patreon. Whether it's a one time thing or an ongoing commitment, every couple of dollars helps!
UserModules.Patreon.Name: 🦘 Keep Braytech Ad-free
UserModules.Raids.ChallengeUnavailable: 🦘 The challenge couldn't be determined at this time.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ALinkToTheC: During the Consecrated Mind encounter, all players must refresh their Enlightened buff at approximately the same time. However, the team may be split up at different tethers.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.AllForOneOn: 保險庫關: 每個守護者必須獲取並放置壹次 Buff （Boss 必須在3次輸出階段以內擊殺）.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ColiseumCha: 秋露·知追逐關: 守護者們不能受到秋露·知的電能爆發的傷害.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ForeverFigh: 摩格斯關: 不要擊殺小巨魔, 只殺大格格.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Gauntlet.De: 守護者不能在同壹個臺子上站超過壹次.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.HoldTheLine: 市區遭遇戰: 地圖生成器不得低於壹半電量.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.KeepOut: 保險庫關: 騎士必須在刷新的房間內被擊殺.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.LimitedBles: 儀式關: 在蟲群儀式進行時同時不能有超過兩名守護者擁有女巫祝福.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.OfAllTrades: 不使用氣閘室清除複製BUFF
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.PleasureGar: 每個棱鏡持有者每個階段只能射擊一個植物
需要壹個守護者在整個關卡中保持他的腳踩在水中.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StayingAliv: 完成神聖心靈遭遇戰而沒有在BOSS Harpy面前殺死任何壹只獨眼巨人. 而在其他區域中的獨眼巨人, 可在最後沖刺的時候被殺死.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StrengthOfM: 瑞文關: 守護者們不能射擊同壹只眼兩次.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.SummoningRi: 卡麗關: 凈化全部九個臺子, 擊殺所有九個騎士, 並且在輸出卡麗之前擊殺所有巨魔.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Throne.Desc: 每次輸出階段同時使用4個臺子.在所有臺子激活前不要開火.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Throne.Name: 王座
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ToEachTheir: 暴行首領關: 每個守護者每個階段不能射擊並破壞超過壹個護盾生成器.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ToTheTop: 擊殺成聖心智階段每次都必須存入 10 個熒光
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.TotalVictor: 分身關: 壹個階段內五次擊破分身的護盾.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.WithBothHan: “加爾蘭關: 每個守護者只能在真身舉起他的手時只射擊真身的手壹次.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ZeroToOneHu: During the Sanctified Mind encounter, bank 30 motes at each Vex relay. At each relay, all 30 motes must be deposited within 10 seconds of one another.
UserModules.SeasonArtifact.NoArtifactYet: 🦘 Your Guardian hasn't received an artifact yet.
UserModules.SeasonArtifact.Progression.D: 獲得XP可以得到能量點數和解鎖強大的mod, 這些mod可以被插入到武器和盔甲中.
UserModules.SeasonPass.Name: 🦘 Season Pass
UserModules.TrialsOfOsiris.Info: 與聖人-14交談開始妳的試煉

Views.Credits.Description: 🦘 About the Guardians who make it possible
Views.Credits.Name: 致謝
Views.Credits.Origins.Description:
🦘 Braytech has been, and continues to be, a multipurpose facility for its developer to practice and learn how to better program and work with others. It started out as a cool hobby to help pass the time and transformed into a bit of a monster.

This beast is developed by a guy from Australia, but not without the moral support and guidance of others who he'd like to describe here.

The third party developer community that grows in Destiny's backyard is a kind one that helps one another and is a beautiful thing. So, shout outs to the crew at [Destiny Item Manager](https://destinyitemmanager.com/), [Richard Deveraux](https://lowlidev.com.au/), and all the others who've kept Tom sane while he tries to do the silly things he does.
Views.Credits.Origins.Name: 🦘 A Lone Wolf
